text: Strafford is a city in eastern Greene County, Missouri. The 2020 United States Census reported about 2,476 people living within the city. Strafford is part of the Springfield metropolitan area. The history of Strafford dates back to 1870. That year, the railroad was made longer to that point. It was named for the original owner of that site. A post office called Strafford began operation at the exact same time. ==References== Category:Cities in Missouri
title: Strafford, Missouri
